title.rendered: Silver Homes – Pune’s Best Old Age Home

content.rendered:
Our loved ones deserves the best possible care

Silver homes is Pune (Balewadi) (Baner) based old age care home. Silver Home’s journey begins from 17th Sept 2017. We have three stories building equipped with all modern necessities with hospitals back up. It is a 100 bedded capacity old age home.

“Caring for seniors is a labor of love and requires a special person”

Our history in medical field began 60 years age. Shree clinic was our first establishment.We worked with PMC hospitals (Dalvi hospital) for 7 years. Currently we are working at 3 different locations in Pune city and Silver Homes is one of our establishment which runs for senior citizens.

The concept of an old age home is new to India. An old age home is usually the place, where the senior citizen feels happy and secured. The place is of course like home where the inmates get all the facilities for a routine living, like good food, nursing care, compassionate care.

Silver Homes is a home away from home.

Our Mission :- Our mission is to become a pioneer in senior citizen’s living industry. Our mission is to become most respected and popular brand in service industry for senior citizens.

Our Vision:-

To enhance our efforts towards excellence of service through:

– Seeking to continuously meet client’s expectations.

– Seeking to consistently deliver high-quality services to senior citizens.

– Seeking to be a leader and its center for senior citizen’s services nationally.

Our Core Values
1. सेवाभाव — Service With Compassion
2. सद्‍‍भावना — Good Will & Positive Feeling
3. सहकार्य — Collaboration & Team Work
4. सहयोग — Assistance & Team Work
